account_sid.description: The unique identifier for the Twilio account associated with the conference participant.

call_sid.description: The unique identifier for the call made by the participant.

label.description: A custom label assigned to the participant for identification.

conference_sid.description: The unique identifier for the conference the participant is a part of.

date_created.description: The date and time when the participant was added to the conference.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the participant's information was last updated.

end_conference_on_exit.description: Indicates whether the conference will end when the participant exits.

muted.description: Indicates whether the participant's audio is muted.

hold.description: Indicates whether the participant is on hold.

status.description: The current status of the participant in the conference.

start_conference_on_enter.description: Indicates whether the conference will start when the participant enters.

coaching.description: Indicates whether the participant is in coaching mode.

call_sid_to_coach.description: The unique identifier for the call made to the coach.

uri.description: The URI for accessing the details of the conference participant.
